knimeNode.name: SQL Extract
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extracts the SQL query from a database port.

fullDescription.intro: This node extracts the SQL query from a database port and creates a flow variable and data table containing the query.
fullDescription.option: The name of the flow variable and table column to be used for the outputs.

ports.inPort: A database port with a connection and a query
ports.outPort: The SQL query as a flow variable
The SQL query as a string cell in a table with 1 row and 1 column.
